TopicTitle: Alt+f12 does not open Debug Menu

Articles.Content:
Notes:

Version: 1.2 AND 1.1.3 both had this issue. The debug menu DID work in 1.1.3 but it stopped for some reason

My keyboard works FINE. I tried testing it and both alt + f12 work fine. I have some macros on my mouse, and i tried binding alt+f12 to that. Still, the debug menu would not work.

Please help! Also, back in 1.1.3, HyperEdit has an option to bring up the debug menu and it worked.
There's no option in the controls menu, which was my first thought - maybe I'm using the wrong controls? But no...

@Gamel0rd1 What operating system are you on?

Edited October 12, 2016 by Alshain

10 minutes ago, Alshain said:

@Gamel0rd1 What operating system are you on?

Windows 10 64 bit. Had no problems with anything in KSP since yesterday.

 

And I assume you want specs as well? Not sure that would affect a debug menu but you never know:

Intel i7 4790k 4.2 GHz

Asus 1080 Strix (gpu)

16GB RAM

2TB HDD
I was just making sure you weren't on linux trying to use the Windows mod-key.

I was having the same problem too, but I think i fixed it. If you have NVIDIA Share enabled in your GeForce Experience, turn it off. The reason for this is because Alt + F12 if bound to the FPS overlay in NVIDIA Share instead of the debug menu in KSP.

http://imgur.com/a/6JpDX

3 hours ago, macholamb said:

I was having the same problem too, but I think i fixed it. If you have NVIDIA Share enabled in your GeForce Experience, turn it off. The reason for this is because Alt + F12 if bound to the FPS overlay in NVIDIA Share instead of the debug menu in KSP.

http://imgur.com/a/6JpDX

 

I think I recall it not working on my machine recently as well.  I checked my GeForce Experience settings and Share seemed to be set to Alt + Z by default.

Alt + Z is to open the overlay that allows you to record, but Alt + F12 is to toggle the FPS overlay. To solve this, you have to turn it off by clicking that green switch. The debug menu should now pop up when you press ALT + F12 in-game
Oh, cool.  Thank you.  I have never even open that share section before.

Just had the same problem, I reset all the NVIDVA to alt+gr, now to see if it worked. It worked alt+F12 = debug menu

Edited February 6, 2017 by dragonsmate17
up date
I don't have windows, but I hear for all systems Alt+[modifier key]+F12 works. For my operating system (mac), that would be Alt+Fn+F12.
